name: Truck Wars
description:
Welcome to Truck Wars, a fun casual game where you must craft your truck from scratch using many different parts. Build and crush all your enemies. Find new parts and weapons, build your truck as you want, defeat your enemies in battles and survive.



Truck Wars is a crazy game to boost your adrenaline. Craft and design your truck choosing right modules you like and win. Build your truck from many different parts, take part in the battle and survive!



Experiment! Dominate! Have fun!



Truck Wars offers tons of fun and is absolutely free.



Features:
- Show your engineering talents. Build your truck from whatever tools are available and improve it with hundreds of new parts to create an ultimate machine of death.
- Dozens of modules: mini-gun, spear, fire gun, shield, different wheel types, circular saw etc
- Awesome graphics
- Endless enemies. Endless fun
- Easy and simple controls
